comment.body: 1. To be part of a revolution, a net truly owned by the people. 2. Torrentfreak I guess or reddit. I always thought that  in our times of facebook and surveillance decentralised networks may  be the future and that someone should develop it. Then I found ZeroNet ;)
Often the reason reveals itself in the future. Sometimes you need to go into the valley to know how big a mountain can be. Same goes for sadness and joy. :)
You're a funny guy, are you?

@Vivisect: I been thinking the same lately...with text only, purposeful discussion becomes more important. If I look at Facebook and see all these selfies and self-adulation then ZeroNet looks refreshing :) Although I am not saying that images wouldn't be nice ;)

@Vivisect: Ahaha yes that reminds me of my last attempts at writing a physical letter, my handwriting skills have become so awful. I am used to re-write and correct my sentences and paper won't forgive mistakes.
